citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 345 pm on
11-MAY-17.
Licensee was not available for an inspection due to a scheduled appointment. No other persons available to
accompany inspector.
